overview: Variation in real time on the action of the classic work "The Sunbeam," from 1912 by David W. Griffith.  The deconstruction of the original work makes possible a fragmentation and reorganization of the stage. The whole work becomes then a recreated choreography, where the characters make the narrative wind on depending on their movements.  https://vimeo.com/22696362
title: Variation on The Sunbeam
